DOC.brief_title: Manual Therapy Versus Exercise Knee Osteoarthritis
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis knee osteoarthritis . Inability ambulate least 100 foot , ride stationary bicycle least 10 minute , lie prone position least 10 minute , Intraarticular knee injection within one month study inception , A history exercise induce uncontrolled angina within three month study entry , Severe dyspnea rest , Previous bilateral total knee arthroplasty , Pregnancy , OR The absence knee pain time recruitment study .
